summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1221, for the improvement of Louisa Street from Eastlake Avenue to Boylston Avenue North certain other streets and certain portions certain the streets therein named by constructing concrete sidewalks and other appurtenances therein under Ordinance No. 13416 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
